thread.title: Students sit in silence outside White House to protest gun violence

title: Students sit in silence outside White House to protest gun violence
text:
Students sit in silence outside White House to protest gun violence 4:18pm BST - 01:29 
Students hold a moment of silence outside the White House to mark the 19th anniversary of the massacre at Columbine High School. Rough Cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Students hold a moment of silence outside the White House to mark the 19th anniversary of the massacre at Columbine High School. Rough Cut (no reporter narration) Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HPs2tN
